member.name: IBrowserFrameOptions.GetFrameOptions
member.summary: Retrieves the available browser frame view options.
member.param: Specifies the options requested as a bitwise combination of one or more of the constants of enumeration type .
When this method returns, contains the options that the view can enable (for example, ). This value is not optional and is always equal to, or a subset of, the options specified by dwMask.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBrowserFrameOptions
member.summary: Allows a browser or host to ask what kind of view behavior is supported.
